item.title: 🚨2D Animation Editor with Crypto Meme Knowledge🚨 - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled 2D editor who has a strong understanding of crypto memes. As a 2D editor, your role will involve creating and editing visual content related to cryptocurrency memes. The ideal candidate should have a passion for cryptocurrencies and a deep knowledge of the latest trends in the crypto meme community.

Schedule:
We are seeking for someone  to create around 2 minute videos DAILY . We are searching for someone long term!

Idea:
Our custom created 2D Animation character will be revealing news on crypto on a daily basis. Take a look at the example beneath!

Example:
https://www.youtube.com/@HamsterKombat_Official/videos

    Skills needed:
    - Proficient in 2D editing software
    - Strong understanding of crypto memes and their cultural relevance
    - Ability to add creative and engaging elements to visual content
    - Knowledge of popular cryptocurrency symbols and icons
    - Being able to create videos QUICK!

Must:
Must include previous work in the job post!


If you want to make sure we'll consider your job post make sure to include a loom video introducing yourself and show your previous work.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 14:55 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Adobe Illustrator, English
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Adobe Illustrator, English
Country: Netherlands

item.title: PROFESSIONAL Wedding Video Editor -- Video Editor specific to Wedding Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Professional Wedding Video Editor.

We've hired a few general video editors and noticed they don't understand the emotion the video needs to show in wedding videos.

So we want someone who has already done multiple Wedding Video edits.

IMPORTANT:
When you apply for this job, you NEED TO submit and answer the following questions else you'll be discarded.
• Your Past Wedding Video Edits (Google Drive Link or Website Link is Preferred)
• Your Internet Speed. If possible, send a screenshot taken from speedtest.net website
• Which editing software you use?
• Do you use any LUTs? If yes, which?
• What's your Turnaround time for 5 min Wedding Highlight Video?

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Payment:
- We are an Editing Service Agency and we have multiple pending projects. We'll first start with 1 project to see your ability.

For the 1st project,  we need
• 1 Wedding Highlight Video - 5 mins
• 1 Wedding Teaser Video - 60 secs

Teaser Video - $20
Highlight Video $45 - $50

----------------------------------------------------------------------



Budget: $70
Posted On: June 29, 2024 14:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Wedding & Event Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Color Grading, Wedding & Event Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production

item.title: I am looking for someone to cut footage from basketball videos I have recorded. - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone to cut footage a recent basketball game I have filmed, in summary the game is shot in slow-motion and I need each scoring play from each team cut into sections so that it makes it quicker for when I go and create the final production. Ideally I am looking for someone who loves the game of basketball as they will be able to identify a dime pass or play etc.  If this goes well there will be further work opportunities.

Note: anyone that has shot full games of basketball in slow motion knows it can be a boring task to cut all the footage and I am time poor, with current workload, therefore, reaching out for someone who wants to make some relatively easy money although its not overly exciting.

You would need to cut the footage in Adobe Premier pro and then the file sent back as the .prproj . Apart from cutting the footage that's all that is needed, I dont need coloring or motion effects as that's already my trade craft.   I will need to upload all the footage when I find a candidate, therefore, please do not accept this job and expect it to start straight away, I will need a number of hours for the footage to upload to the drive as I am posting this before I have commence that task.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 29, 2024 14:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Stock Footage, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Stock Footage, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I need a talented video editor who can edit similarly and also BETTER than these 3 channels:
(Note: links will be share in chat room)
Your job consists of finding old footage and images relevant to the topic of the video. You must ONLY source footage that is 100% relevant the the topic being discussed, we do not want to see any stock footage or things like that.

Most videos will average 7-9 minutes in length.

Since we pay $3 PER MINUTE, I expect much better editing than the previously mentioned channels. I want to see you doing cool animations, image pop-ups, transitions in between clips, retro effects, and overlays that match the channel's vibe, frequent use of captions and text, etc.

Background music and narration are already provided.

Please attach samples of your previous work when applying!

Good luck!

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 29, 2024 14:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, Video Post-Editing
